name: Premium Wireless Headphones
description: Experience crystal-clear sound with our premium wireless headphones. Features noise cancellation, 20-hour battery life, and comfortable over-ear design.

reviews.comment: Best headphones I've ever owned! Sound quality is amazing.
Great sound, but battery could be better. Overall very good product.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Track your fitness goals with this smart watch. Features heart rate monitoring, step counter, sleep tracking, and water resistance up to 50m.

reviews.comment: Accurate tracking and great battery life! Worth every rupee.

name: Designer Cotton T-Shirt
description: Premium cotton t-shirt with modern design. Comfortable, breathable, and perfect for casual wear.

reviews.comment: Good quality fabric, but sizing runs a bit small.

name: Professional DSLR Camera
description: Capture stunning images with this professional DSLR camera. Features 24.2MP sensor, 4K video recording, and advanced autofocus system.

reviews.comment: Amazing image quality and easy to use. Professional results every time!

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Eco-friendly stainless steel water bottle. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours. 750ml capacity.

reviews.comment: Good quality, but slightly heavy when filled.

name: Leather Wallet
description: Genuine leather wallet with multiple card slots and secure coin pocket. Slim design fits comfortably in pocket.

reviews.comment: Premium quality leather and excellent craftsmanship!

name: Bluetooth Portable Speaker
description: Compact portable speaker with powerful sound. Features Bluetooth 5.0, 10-hour battery life, and waterproof design.

reviews.comment: Great sound for its size! Perfect for outdoor use.

name: Organic Green Tea (100g)
description: Premium organic green tea from the hills of Darjeeling. Rich in antioxidants and naturally refreshing.

reviews.comment: The aroma and taste are exceptional! Will definitely buy again.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip yoga mat made from eco-friendly materials. Perfect thickness for comfort during practice.

reviews.comment: Good grip and comfortable cushioning. Value for money.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: High-precision wireless gaming mouse with RGB lighting. Features adjustable DPI and ergonomic design for extended gaming sessions.

reviews.comment: Responsive, comfortable, and the battery lasts for days! Perfect for gaming.

name: Designer Sunglasses
description: Stylish polarized sunglasses with UV protection. Lightweight frame and classic design suits all face shapes.

reviews.comment: Good quality and stylish design, but case could be better.

name: Smartphone Power Bank 20000mAh
description: High-capacity power bank for smartphones and tablets. Features fast charging, dual USB ports, and compact design.

reviews.comment: Charges my phone multiple times. Great for travel!
